commit.message:
Open output index file in binary mode

Fix https://github.com/bxlab/bx-python/issues/47 .
Fix some flake8 and syntax errors

Fix 3 scripts

Fix the following issues:

```
*** Error compiling '/tmp/pip-install-778bgpav/bx-python/bx_python-0.8.5.data/scripts/axt_to_fasta.py'...
  File "/tmp/pip-install-778bgpav/bx-python/bx_python-0.8.5.data/scripts/axt_to_fasta.py", line 12
    from __future__ import print_function

SyntaxError: from __future__ imports must occur at the beginning of the file
```

```
*** Error compiling '/tmp/pip-install-778bgpav/bx-python/bx_python-0.8.5.data/scripts/maf_print_chroms.py'...
Sorry: TabError: inconsistent use of tabs and spaces in indentation (maf_print_chroms.py, line 35)
```

```
*** Error compiling '/tmp/pip-install-778bgpav/bx-python/bx_python-0.8.5.data/scripts/ucsc_gene_table_to_intervals.py'...
  File "/tmp/pip-install-778bgpav/bx-python/bx_python-0.8.5.data/scripts/ucsc_gene_table_to_intervals.py", line 65
    exon_ends = [int(_) for _ in fields[9].rstrip( ',\n' ).split( ',' ) ))]

SyntaxError: invalid syntax
```

and several flake8 errors.
